meanings.definition: A decorative technique in which designs are engraved on metal and filled with a black alloy.
meanings.sent1: The artisan carefully applied nielli to the intricate metal design.
meanings.sent2: The nielli added a beautiful contrast to the silver bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf painted his face with nielli, pretending to be a mysterious warrior.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like nielli in the sunlight, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The nielli transformed the plain metal into a work of art, mesmerizing all who saw it.
